prayerTimes.pleaseSetLocation: Please set your location to see prayer times

ramadan.eatBalancedSuhoor: Eat a balanced suhoor with protein and complex carbs
ramadan.breakFastWithDates: Break your fast with dates and water as per Sunnah
ramadan.planTaraweeh: Plan your Taraweeh prayers and Quran recitation
ramadan.duaIftar: Allahumma inni laka sumtu, wa bika aamantu, wa alayka tawakkaltu, wa ala rizqika aftartu
ramadan.duaLaylatAlQadr: Allahumma innaka afuwwun tuhibbul afwa fa'fu anni

ramadanTracker.seeYouNextYear: See you next year, in sha Allah

location.notFoundInCityList: "{query}" not found in our city list. Please use "Detect My Location" instead.
location.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser

settings.notificationsDescription: You will receive notifications before prayer times
settings.enableToReceive: Enable to receive notifications before prayer times
settings.learnHow: Learn how we handle your data

privacy.introText: Welcome to Noorix's Privacy Policy. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.locationData: Location data (with your permission) to provide accurate prayer times
privacy.appSettings: App settings such as preferred calculation method, madhab, and time format
privacy.anonymousData: Anonymous usage data through Firebase Analytics
privacy.weUse: We use the collected information to:
privacy.providePrayerTimes: Provide accurate prayer times based on your location
privacy.savePreferences: Save your preferences to improve user experience
privacy.improveApp: Improve our app based on anonymous usage data
privacy.dataStorageText: Your settings and location data are stored locally on your device using localStorage. We do not transfer this data to our servers except for anonymous analytics data.
privacy.weUseThirdParty: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.firebaseAnalytics: To collect anonymous data about app usage
privacy.aladhanAPI: To fetch accurate prayer times based on your location
privacy.notificationsText: If you enable notifications, we will send local notifications for prayer times. These notifications are processed locally on your device and are not sent through our servers.
privacy.youHaveRights: You have the following rights regarding your data:
privacy.rightToAccess: The right to access your data
privacy.rightToRectify: The right to rectify inaccurate data
privacy.rightToErasure: The right to erasure of your data
privacy.rightToRestrict: The right to restrict processing of your data
privacy.changesText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at: privacy@noorix.app
